data.description: ​Cancer is one of the leading causes of death worldwide. In 2020, close to 10 million lives were lost due to cancer. The most common types of cancer are cancers of the breast, lung, colon and rectum, and prostate. One of the main hindrances of cancer treatmen…
data.content: Apart from the signs mentioned above one should also be careful about the following signs of cancer: testicular swelling, difficulty in eating and swallowing food, troubled gut health, wheezing, chro… [+192 chars]
